name: Companioneer
description:
The Astroneer Companion App with a Crank

I always wanted to make something for that awesome little yellow console, and as I have been playing Astroneer a lot lately, I decided to make this little companion app for it. Companioneer is basically just a fancy cheat sheet, but I found it very helpful even on my fourth playthrough of the game.

It's a database of every resource and composite material that appears in the game. It shows where to get them and how to craft them.

I might add more stuff in the future.

Spoiler Alert

It also has all the necessary information on how to activate each planet, so I think a spoiler alert is in order.

Acknowledgements

Companioneer uses the twoFace-Multi font by Ron Lent (ronlent).
